description: ASHRAE Standard 90.1 performance curves for centrifugal water-cooled chiller (Path A)

CapFT.equation: CapFT = a + b*T_chw + c*T_chw^2 + d*T_cw + e*T_cw^2 + f*T_chw*T_cw

EIRFT.description: Energy Input Ratio (EIR) as function of temperature
EIRFT.equation: EIRFT = a + b*T_chw + c*T_chw^2 + d*T_cw + e*T_cw^2 + f*T_chw*T_cw

EIRFPLR.description: EIR as function of part load ratio
